name: Workflowy - Clean Dark
description: A dark theme for your notes, tasks, and projects in Workflowy.
additional_info:
v1.9 - 6 Apr 2019 - hover popup location fix
v1.8 - 22 Jan 2019 - style update
v1.7 - 1 Jan 2019 - hover popup, bullets, and notification location fix
v1.6 - 8 Nov 2018 - visual update - header fixed, clean bullets and tags
v1.5 - 31 Oct 2018 - minor fix, change of default colors, moved the favorite button a bit
v1.4 - 29 Oct 2018 - fixed background color in the sharing popup and settings
v1.3 - 25 Oct 2018 - color tags and url, hover popup location ( dynamic classes fix )
v1.2 - 21 Oct 2018 - hover popup location fix
v1.1 - 18 Oct 2018 - visual update changes, higher contrast, disabled area hover effect, full width, clear font style
